long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create short links on any page with just one click! Generate a QR code of your URL directly inside the extension.

In your browser toolbar click on the Clmp extension, then click on the "Shortify & Copy" button. Your current page url will be shortified and copied automatically. You can now past it whenever you want.
